ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Timepoint/visit label
Notes: e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2; Morning, At Bedtime

ElementDescription: Which of the following are reasons you want to quit smoking right now? Check off all that apply to you. I do not want to quit
Which of the following are reasons you want to quit smoking right now? Check off all that apply to you. To save money/smoking is too expensive
Which of the following are reasons you want to quit smoking right now? Check off all that apply to you. My parents want me to quit
Which of the following are reasons you want to quit smoking right now? Check off all that apply to you. My boyfriend/girlfriend wants me to quit
Which of the following are reasons you want to quit smoking right now? Check off all that apply to you. My friends want me to quit
Which of the following are reasons you want to quit smoking right now? Check off all that apply to you. Because I've gotten punished for smoking
Which of the following are reasons you want to quit smoking right now? Check off all that apply to you. It is too difficult to get cigarettes
Which of the following are reasons you want to quit smoking right now? Check off all that apply to you. Worried about my health
Which of the following are reasons you want to quit smoking right now? Check off all that apply to you. So I can perform better at sports
Which of the following are reasons you want to quit smoking right now? Check off all that apply to you. Do not like the way it makes me smell
Which of the following are reasons you want to quit smoking right now? Check off all that apply to you. Stains my finger/teeth
Which of the following are reasons you want to quit smoking right now? Check off all that apply to you. Do not like to be identified as a smoker
Which of the following are reasons you want to quit smoking right now? Check off all that apply to you. Do not enjoy smoking as much as I thought I would
Which of the following are reasons you want to quit smoking right now? Check off all that apply to you. Do not like how I look while smoking
Which of the following are reasons you want to quit smoking right now? Check off all that apply to you. Smoking makes me feel sick
Which of the following are reasons you want to quit smoking right now? Check off all that apply to you. Another reason
Which of the following are reasons you want to quit smoking right now? Check off all that apply to you. Another reason, specify
How motivated are you to quit smoking?  How motivated are you to quit smoking on a scale where 1 = 'not at all motivated' and 10 = 'extremely motivated?'
Notes: 1 = Not at all motivated; 10 = Extremely motivated

ElementDescription: How motivated are you to quit vaping or e-cigarette use on a scale where 1 = 'not at all motivated' and 10 = 'extremely motivated?'
Notes: 1= Not at all motivated; 10= Extremely motivated

ElementDescription: Do you plan to quit smoking?
(If mtq_plan = 1) When do you plan to quit smoking cigarettes totally and for good?
Notes: 1= Within the next 30 days (preparation); 2= Within  the next six months (contemplative); 3= Longer than six months (precontemplative)

ElementDescription: Have you smoked at least part of a cigarette in the last 7 days?
